mean_cn: n.药房；药剂学；配药业，制药业；一批备用药品
mean_en: a shop/store, or part of one, that sells medicines and drugs; a place in a hospital where medicines are prepared; the study of how to prepare medicines and drugs
sentence: You can find any medicine you need at this pharmacy.
sentence_trans: 在这家药房你能找到任何你需要的药物。
word_etyma: pharm药剂 + acy构成抽象名词，表示性质、状态 → 药房，药剂学，配药业
